description:
Ruby runs the Grapefruit plantation along with her staff which covers the area accross the Seven Grapefruit Islands. The third island is where the plantation is mainly run and Ruby stores the grapefruit here in warehouses.
Ruby and her staff take great care in looking after the grapefruit trees and because of this their produce is of the highest quality.
When a Snorlax arrived on the island Ruby and her staff rallied together and picked as many grapefruit as they can to make sure Snorlax did not get them.
name: Nana
